main: ^Good morning students. The police officers here to help us find our missing classmate.
^Hello, students. Based on our investigation, one of you has been with Teddy Junzales where he was last seen.
awawa: ^Boy with thick hair, were you with him yesterday?
ahhasadd: ^I was with him yesterday after school!
krewk: ^Very well, son. How you two separate yesterday?
Directly: ^He went to a town’s game event with a tall man because he said he is giving away game passes.
^Game event? There wasn’t a game event permitted to us yesterday.
^What does the tall man look like?
Silent: ^This is very hard. I think the boy is afraid.
Describe: ^The police woman handed you a paper to draw on.
LASTQ: ^Last question, Where and when does this happen?
NearKompyuter: ^That is it for now. Thank you, son.
TusokTusok: ^That is it for now. Thank you, son.
IDR: ^I don’t remember the time and I think it’s across the street.
mewmew: ^The police officers thanked Teacher and left the room.
^Now, kids. Here’s a lesson for all of you.
^Never believe or talk to any strangers, okay.
^If you ever feel unsafe, you can call your parents on the phone or approach to police officers and teachers.
^Let’s all hope that our dear Teddy will be found soon.
